metadata.Title: CVE-2022-1552 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
security update

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2022-1552` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libecpg-compat3 - 13.7-0ubuntu0.21.10.1
libecpg6 - 13.7-0ubuntu0.21.10.1
libpgtypes3 - 13.7-0ubuntu0.21.10.1
libpq5 - 13.7-0ubuntu0.21.10.1
postgresql-13 - 13.7-0ubuntu0.21.10.1
postgresql-client-13 - 13.7-0ubuntu0.21.10.1
postgresql-plperl-13 - 13.7-0ubuntu0.21.10.1
postgresql-plpython3-13 - 13.7-0ubuntu0.21.10.1
postgresql-pltcl-13 - 13.7-0ubuntu0.21.10.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: postgresql-13 package in impish was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '13.7-0ubuntu0.21.10.1').
